channel.title: My school must be retarded :P
channel.description:
This doesn't make any sence! We have a late start tomorrow 2 hours and 20 minutes, but, if we get snow (not likely) we will only get a 2 hour late start! How does that make sence! Why don't they just give us the normal schedule if they are only trying to keep the busses off of the ice... By the way, i live in washington and we never get snow so if a snowflake lands on the ground they cancel school for like a month.
Anyways... If they are just trying to avoid ice then why does it matter if we go 20 minutes later...
Just to make myself clear i don't really care i just thought that whoever came up with this idea was smoking crack, and pot, and heroin, and .....

cool u guys have snowy days
